sql.if: and (t.yjdzsheng LIKE concat(concat('%',#{yjdz}),'%') or t.yjdzshi LIKE concat(concat('%',#{yjdz}),'%') or t.yjdzxx LIKE concat(concat('%',#{yjdz}),'%'))

mapper.sql: t.qyid qyid, t.userid userid, t.zwgsmc zwgsmc, t.ywgsmc ywgsmc, t.frdb frdb, t.frdbdh frdbdh, t.yjdzsheng yjdzsheng, t.yjdzshi yjdzshi, t.yjdzxx yjdzxx, t.bgdh bgdh, t.cz cz, t.lxr lxr, t.lxrsj lxrsj, t.wz wz, t.dzyx dzyx, t.yyzz yyzz, t.sjzt sjzt, t.shzt shzt, t.shrid shrid, t.shrmc shrmc, TO_CHAR(t.shsj,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') shsj, t.delete_flag deleteFlag, t.cjrid cjrid, t.cjrmc cjrmc, TO_CHAR(t.cjsj,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') cjsj, t.xgrid xgrid, t.xgrmc xgrmc, TO_CHAR(t.xgsj,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') xgsj, t.reserve1 reserve1, t.reserve2 reserve2, t.reserve3 reserve3, TO_CHAR(t.reserve4,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') reserve4
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(0) AS NUM FROM CFPA_QY_JBXX t WHERE 1=1 AND DELETE_FLAG = 'N'

SELECT , k.tyshxydm tyshxydm, c2.code_name sjztmc, c4.code_name shztmc FROM CFPA_QY_JBXX t
Left Join SYS_CODELIST c1 on c1.CODETYPE = 'SJZT' And c1.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' Left Join SYS_CODELIST_DETAIL c2 On c1.CODEID = c2.CODEID And c2.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' and t.sjzt = c2.CODE_VALUE
Left Join SYS_CODELIST c3 on c3.CODETYPE = 'SHZT' And c3.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' Left Join SYS_CODELIST_DETAIL c4 On c4.CODEID = c3.CODEID And c4.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' and t.shzt = c4.CODE_VALUE
Left Join CFPA_QY_KPXX k on t.qyid = k.qyid And k.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' WHERE t.DELETE_FLAG = 'N'
mapper.insert:
SELECT SYS_GUID() AS qyid FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO CFPA_QY_JBXX(qyid,userid,zwgsmc,ywgsmc,frdb,frdbdh,yjdzsheng,yjdzshi,yjdzxx,bgdh,cz,lxr,lxrsj,wz,dzyx,yyzz,sjzt,shzt,shrid,shrmc,shsj,delete_flag,cjrid,cjrmc,cjsj,xgrid,xgrmc,xgsj,reserve1,reserve2,reserve3,reserve4) VALUES(#{qyid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{userid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{zwgsmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{ywgsmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{frdb,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{frdbdh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{yjdzsheng,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{yjdzshi,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{yjdzxx,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{bgdh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{cz,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{lxr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{lxrsj,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{wz,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{dzyx,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{yyzz,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{sjzt,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{shzt,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{shrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{shrmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{shsj,jdbcType=DATE},'N',#{cjrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{cjrmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},sysdate,#{xgrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{xgrmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{xgsj,jdbcType=DATE},#{reserve1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{reserve2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{reserve3,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{reserve4,jdbcType=DATE})
mapper.update: UPDATE CFPA_QY_JBXX t SET t.DELETE_FLAG = 'Y' WHERE 1=1 AND t.QYID = #{value}

INSERT INTO CFPA_QY_JBXX(qyid,userid,zwgsmc,ywgsmc,frdb,frdbdh,yjdzsheng,yjdzshi,yjdzxx,bgdh,cz,lxr,lxrsj,wz,dzyx,yyzz,sjzt,shzt,shrid,shrmc,shsj,delete_flag,cjrid,cjrmc,cjsj,xgrid,xgrmc,xgsj,reserve1,reserve2,reserve3,reserve4) VALUES
#{item.qyid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} qyid,#{item.userid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} userid,#{item.zwgsmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR} zwgsmc,#{item.ywgsmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ywgsmc,#{item.frdb,jdbcType=VARCHAR} frdb,#{item.frdbdh,jdbcType=VARCHAR} frdbdh,#{item.yjdzsheng,jdbcType=VARCHAR} yjdzsheng,#{item.yjdzshi,jdbcType=VARCHAR} yjdzshi,#{item.yjdzxx,jdbcType=VARCHAR} yjdzxx,#{item.bgdh,jdbcType=VARCHAR} bgdh,#{item.cz,jdbcType=VARCHAR} cz,#{item.lxr,jdbcType=VARCHAR} lxr,#{item.lxrsj,jdbcType=VARCHAR} lxrsj,#{item.wz,jdbcType=VARCHAR} wz,#{item.dzyx,jdbcType=VARCHAR} dzyx,#{item.yyzz,jdbcType=VARCHAR} yyzz,#{item.sjzt,jdbcType=VARCHAR} sjzt,#{item.shzt,jdbcType=VARCHAR} shzt,#{item.shrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} shrid,#{item.shrmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR} shrmc,#{item.shsj,jdbcType=DATE} shsj,'N' delete_flag,#{item.cjrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} cjrid,#{item.cjrmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR} cjrmc,#{item.cjsj,jdbcType=DATE} cjsj,#{item.xgrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} xgrid,#{item.xgrmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR} xgrmc,#{item.xgsj,jdbcType=DATE} xgsj,#{item.reserve1,jdbcType=VARCHAR} reserve1,#{item.reserve2,jdbcType=VARCHAR} reserve2,#{item.reserve3,jdbcType=VARCHAR} reserve3,#{item.reserve4,jdbcType=DATE} reserve4
ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE qyid = VALUES(qyid), userid = VALUES(userid), zwgsmc = VALUES(zwgsmc), ywgsmc = VALUES(ywgsmc), frdb = VALUES(frdb), frdbdh = VALUES(frdbdh), yjdzsheng = VALUES(yjdzsheng), yjdzshi = VALUES(yjdzshi), yjdzxx = VALUES(yjdzxx), bgdh = VALUES(bgdh), cz = VALUES(cz), lxr = VALUES(lxr), lxrsj = VALUES(lxrsj), wz = VALUES(wz), dzyx = VALUES(dzyx), yyzz = VALUES(yyzz), sjzt = VALUES(sjzt), shzt = VALUES(shzt), shrid = VALUES(shrid), shrmc = VALUES(shrmc), shsj = VALUES(shsj), delete_flag = VALUES(delete_flag), cjrid = VALUES(cjrid), cjrmc = VALUES(cjrmc), cjsj = VALUES(cjsj), xgrid = VALUES(xgrid), xgrmc = VALUES(xgrmc), xgsj = VALUES(xgsj), reserve1 = VALUES(reserve1), reserve2 = VALUES(reserve2), reserve3 = VALUES(reserve3), reserve4 = VALUES(reserve4)
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM CFPA_QY_JBXX t WHERE t.DELETE_FLAG = 'N'

SELECT s.username, s.userid, u.pkid,
FROM SYS_ACCOUNT s LEFT JOIN CFPA_QY_JBXX t ON s.userid = t.userid AND t.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' INNER JOIN SYS_USER u ON s.userid = u.userid AND u.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' AND u.deptid = 'ZSYH' WHERE s.DELETE_FLAG = 'N'
and s.username LIKE concat(concat('%',#{username}),'%')
